The X server will not be able to send the VDPAU driver name to libvdpau

AFAIK that is because the dri and dri2 modules from xorg-x11(mesa) opengl setup are not in path. I worked around this by

1 Quote:
2 Section "Files" 
3 ModulePath "/usr/lib/xorg/modules" 
4 ModulePath "/usr/lib/opengl/xorg-x11/extensions/" 
5 ... 
6 EndSection
